SEARCH

Class ParentControls

java.lang.Object
ParentControls
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ParentControls extends Object implements Serializable
The Parent class provides parental control features such as time restrictions, playtime limits, and pet revival. It includes password protection to prevent unauthorized access.
See Also:

    • ParentControls

      public ParentControls(String password)
      Constructs a Parent object with a specified password.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • isEnabled

      public boolean isEnabled()
      Checks if parental controls are enabled.
      Returns:
      true if enabled, false otherwise.

    • setEnabled

      public void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Enables or disables parental controls.
      Parameters:
      enabled - true to enable, false to disable.

    • resetTime

      public void resetTime()
      Resets the allowed playtime and clears any set restrictions.

    • setRestrictions

      public void setRestrictions(List<LocalTime> allowedHours)
      Sets restrictions by defining allowed hours of gameplay.
      Parameters:
      allowedHours - A list of allowed playtime hours.

    • revivePet

      public boolean revivePet(Pet pet)
      Revives the pet, restoring its stats to the maximum value.
      Parameters:
      pet - the pet
      Returns:
      if pet is revived

    • setAllowedHours

      public void setAllowedHours(List<LocalTime> hours)
      Sets the allowed playtime hours.
      Parameters:
      hours - A list of LocalTime objects representing allowed play hours.

    • setMaxPlaytime

      public void setMaxPlaytime(int minutes)
      Sets the maximum playtime allowed in minutes.
      Parameters:
      minutes - The maximum number of minutes allowed for play.

    • getMaxPlaytime

      public int getMaxPlaytime()
      Gets the maximum playtime allowed.
      Returns:
      The maximum allowed playtime in minutes.

    • getAllowedHours

      public List<LocalTime> getAllowedHours()
      Retrieves the allowed play hours.
      Returns:
      A list of allowed play hours.

    • verifyPassword

      public boolean verifyPassword(String inputPassword)
      Verifies if the given password matches the stored parental control password.
      Parameters:
      inputPassword - The password entered by the user.
      Returns:
      true if the password matches, false otherwise.
